entry.content:
Today, a twitter account in the schizo-techno rw twitter exploded in relative popularity https://twitter.com/_zinniaa__ . It not only captured my attention, but clearly the attention of the whole section of twitter with several 'banger' (viral) tweets.
This is actually an interesting coincidence, as the target audience of such an account somewhat overlaps with the reader of BAM (Bronze Age Mindset) -- a book I just finished reading. Because of this, I was able to get many of the references.
Whats interesting about these two events -- both reading the book and stumbling on this side of twitter -- is that I am discovering a new kind of emerging right wing. I feel like this right wing is distinct from the lame and crusty right that contained people such as Bush and Romney, but I also feel like it is distinct from the annoying right that contained people such as Trump and his followers. It feels more *with it* and intellectual than both. Because of this, while still niche, I feel like this flavor of rw politics can compete with the current mainstream left wing politics.
